Class ZombieAttackBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.AttackBehaviour
      • game.ZombieAttackBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behaviour

    public class ZombieAttackBehaviour
extends AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates a ZombieAttackAction if there is an attackable Actor standing beside it.
    Author:
    Daniel Yuen

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZombieAttackBehaviour

        public ZombieAttackBehaviour(ZombieCapability attackableTeam,
                             int armsNumber)
        Constructor. Calls the parent class constructor to set the team that the owner of this Behaviour is allowed to attack.
        Parameters:
        attackableTeam - Team descriptor for ZombieActors that can be attacked
        armsNumber - Number of arms belonging to the owner of the behaviour
